pr_title: Report system stats with OSHI instead of libsigar

timeline.message:
Add OSHI as system stats reporter

This commit adds a new Operating System and Hardware Information library, OSHI, that does not require the cumbersome packaging that Sigar currently needs. This library has a very active community and a pretty good platform options. A new config option, enable_oshi, is added, that defaults to false.
Completely remove sigar, update to latest oshi

Fix filesystem lookup

Flip the mountpoint path comparision the other way around.
We need to compare the path against the mountpoint.

Fix JvmStats with Java 11

There is no bootclasspath option anymore
Report absolute path, like libsigar did.
Keep libsigar semantics for type_name and sys_type_name

Find diskstore via volume name

This is simpler and also supports LVM mapped disks.
E.g. with a LUKS setup:

 lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 7 Nov 26 10:33 /dev/mapper/ubuntu--vg-root -> ../dm-1

Find primary interface by the systems default gateway

The lookup via InetAddress.getLocalHost() isn't always
relieable. Ubuntu for instance defaults the hostname to 127.0.1.1
which isn't bound to any interface.

Fix Processor info

kHZ -> MHz

Use full processor string instead of model number

Try two approaches for searching the diskstore

First try search for the diskstore with the logical volume or volume name.
If that finds nothing, try to search for the diskstore with the partition of our mountpoint.

Using only the volume names, did not work on MacOS
Fix space and inodes use percentage calculation
